traits.name: Water Breathing
traits.desc: The giant seahorse can only breathe underwater.

actions.name: Tail Slap
actions.desc: Melee Weapon Attack: +5 to hit, reach 5 ft., one target. Hit: 7 (1d8 + 3) bludgeoning damage.

actions.name: Head Butt
actions.desc: Melee Weapon Attack: +5 to hit, reach 5 ft., one target. Hit: 7 (1d8 + 3) bludgeoning damage.
